# Companion repository for 401-3040-25L Formalising Mathematics in Lean

Welcome to the companion repository for 401-3040-25L!

For the first weeks we will be using the *Mathematics in Lean* repository as a source for exercises. You can find here the documents that we will fill out during the lecture!

If you want to test the documents in the live lean server, you can do so by clicking on the files below

# How to use the repo

0. Install Lean

1. Clone the course repo
```
git clone https://github.com/jaumededios/ETHZ_Formalizing_Math.git
cd ETHZ_Formalizing_Math
```

2.  Set up and build
```
elan self update
lake update
lake exe cache get
lake build
```

3. Open the repo in vscode

# Alternative options

If this fails but you have the MIL repo ready, you can copy the lean files in there. 

- W01
  - [01_Welcome.lean](https://live.lean-lang.org/#)
- W02
  - [01_Tactics.lean](https://live.lean-lang.org/#)
  - [02_Nilradical.lean](https://live.lean-lang.org/#)
  - [03_Continuous.lean](https://live.lean-lang.org/#)
